speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0260/2008 ) by Frédérique Ries, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the mid-term review of the European Environment and Health Action Plan 2004-2010 ( 2007/2252(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0260/2008 ) by Frédérique Ries, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the mid-term review of the European Environment and Health Action Plan 2004-2010 ( 2007/2252(INI) ).
agenda_item: Mid-term review of the European Environment and Health Action Plan 2004-2010 (debate)
